data.name: Westpac Business One Loan
data.description: For business loans over $250,000, the Westpac Business One Loan provides a flexible line of credit with full transaction access.

features.additionalInfo: Flexible repayment options -interest only, or principal + interest.
A variable base interest rate (margins apply) .Borrow from 250000

features.additionalValue: Multiple ways to access funds including Online, Mobile, Tablet and Telephone Banking (when you're registered for these services), plus ATMs (using a Business Debit Mastercard linked to your Business One Loan account) and in branches. Optional cheque book access.

features.additionalInfo: Supported by specialist relationship managers, locally based in metropolitan and regional centres throughout Australia.

features.additionalValue: Convenience and acceptance : Link a Business Debit Mastercard to your Westpac Business One Loan for convenient access to funds at more than 3,000 Westpac, St.George, Bank SA and Bank of Melbourne ATMs, and wherever Mastercard is accepted throughout Australia and overseas.
Keeping the bookkeeper happy :Save time and money by exporting transactions to your accounting software Opt for eStatements instead of paper and access up to 7 years of transactions.

features.additionalInfo: Your Westpac Business One Loan line of credit is set up on your Westpac Business One Transaction account. You can apply to set up the account and your line of credit at the same time.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Business must be registered in Australia

A business entity domiciled in Australia or an individual 18 years and above or strata corporation domiciled in Australia and requires the funding for business or investment purposes other than investment in residential property
